title: Vantage Data Centers plans $25 billion AI campus in Texas
description: Vantage Data Centers said on Tuesday it would spend more than $25 billion to build a 1,200-acre data center campus in Shackelford County, Texas, as surging demand for artificial intelligence infrastructure fuels mega-scale developments.

title: Quebec City using artificial intelligence to manage traffic, reduce congestion
description: According to Google Canada, Quebec City is the first municipality in the country to partner with the web giant's Green Light project.
content:
Send this page to someone via email
Quebec City has started synchronizing traffic lights with the use of Google’s artificial intelligence, technology the city says will improve traffic flow, reduce congestion, and lower greenhouse gas emissions.

title: More people trust AI instead of friends for shopping opinions, expert says
description: As people in DC region finish up their back-to-school shopping ahead of the first day of class, many of them may be turning to artificial intelligence for opinions.
content:

title: Israeli-founded AI startup raises $60m to help governments fight financial fraud
description: IVIX's software leverages artificial intelligence to help regulators spot money-related crimes, such as money laundering, sanctions evasion and tax non-compliance
content:
Israeli-founded startup IVIX has secured $60 million in fresh capital to help governments and law enforcement agencies detect and fight money laundering and other financial crimes with its artificial intelligence-powered software platform.

title: Meta restructures AI group again in pursuit of superintelligence
description: Meta Platforms is splitting its newly formed artificial intelligence group into four distinct teams and reassigning many of the company’s existing AI employees.

title: Nvidia working on new AI chip for China
description: Nvidia is developing a new artificial intelligence chip for China based on its latest Blackwell architecture that will be more powerful than the H20 model it is currently allowed to sell there, two people briefed on the matter said.

title: Bowman Says ‘Change Is Coming’ to How Fed Views AI and Crypto
description: Banks and regulators must embrace the benefits of new technologies such as artificial intelligence and crypto or risk diminishing their role in the economy, said US Federal Reserve Governor Michelle Bowman.
content:
